timeSeriesQuery.timeSeriesQueryLanguage:
{ fetch k8s_container
  | { metric kubernetes.io/container/cpu/core_usage_time
      | rate
      | every 1m
      | align next_older(2m)
    ; metric kubernetes.io/container/cpu/request_cores
      | align next_older(2m) }
  | group_by [resource.location, resource.cluster_name], .sum()
  | outer_join 0
  | div
; fetch k8s_container
  | { metric kubernetes.io/anthos/container/cpu/core_usage_time
      | rate
      | every 1m
      | align next_older(2m)
    ; metric kubernetes.io/anthos/container/cpu/request_cores
      | align next_older(2m) }
  | group_by [resource.location, resource.cluster_name], .sum()
  | outer_join 0
  | div }
| union
| map
    update[
      resource.cluster_name: re_extract(resource.cluster_name, '(?:.+/|^)(.+)')]
| top 5
| scale "%"

{ fetch k8s_container
  | { metric kubernetes.io/container/memory/used_bytes
    ; metric kubernetes.io/container/memory/request_bytes }
  | align next_older(2m)
  | group_by [resource.location, resource.cluster_name], .sum()
  | outer_join 0
  | div
; fetch k8s_container
  | { metric kubernetes.io/anthos/container/memory/used_bytes
    ; metric kubernetes.io/anthos/container/memory/request_bytes }
  | align next_older(2m)
  | group_by [resource.location, resource.cluster_name], .sum()
  | outer_join 0
  | div }
| union
| map
    update[
      resource.cluster_name: re_extract(resource.cluster_name, '(?:.+/|^)(.+)')]
| top 5
| scale "%"

{ fetch k8s_container
  | metric kubernetes.io/container/restart_count
  | align delta(1m)
  | every 1m
  | group_by [resource.location, resource.cluster_name], .sum()
; fetch k8s_container
  | metric kubernetes.io/anthos/container/restart_count
  | align delta(1m)
  | every 1m
  | group_by [resource.location, resource.cluster_name], .sum() }
| union
| map
    update[
      resource.cluster_name: re_extract(resource.cluster_name, '(?:.+/|^)(.+)')]
| top 5

fetch k8s_container
| metric 'logging.googleapis.com/log_entry_count'
| filter metric.severity =~ 'ERROR|CRITICAL|ALERT|EMERGENCY'
| align rate(1m)
| every 1m
| group_by [resource.location, resource.cluster_name], .sum()
| map
    update[
      resource.cluster_name:
        re_extract(resource.cluster_name, '(?:.+/|^)(.+)', '\\1')]
| top 5
